metadata.name: The NEW Butterfly Dream-신호접지몽
metadata.description:
This is a traditional Korean dance. salpuri,(살풀이)
Traditional dance, animation, and philosophy were captured in one video.

In the scenery where two butterflies dance and play with the dancers, am I a butterfly or a dancer, am I a woman of the past or a woman of the present, am I a dancer or an observer? In the end, I think about who I am.


Directed by: Yuri LEE (Ruria)
Choreography: Misun Kim
Dancer: Misun Kim
Arranged by: Ruria
Illustration/Animation: RURIA


*This NFT work is subject to a 3PM full sound license (https://bit.ly/oneum_license)
